actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill relating to the appointment of the Veterans' Administration Deputy Administrator, the Chief Benefits Director, and the Chief Medical Director; to the authority of the Administrator of the Veterans' Administration to readjust the schedule of ratings for the disabilities of veterans; to the construction, alteration, and acquisition of hospitals and domiciliary facilities; to the closing of hospital and domiciliary facilities and regional officers; and to the transfer of real property under the jurisdiction or control of the Administration.

summary.text: Veterans' Administration Accountability Act - Requires that the appointment of the Veterans' Administration Deputy Administrator, the Chief Benefits Director, and the Chief Medical Director shall be with the advice and consent of the Senate. Limits the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Administration to: (1) readjust the schedule of ratings for the disabilities of veterans; (2) provide for the construction, alteration, and acquisition of hospitals and domiciliary facilities; (3) close hospital and domiciliary facilities and regional offices; and (4) transfer real property under the jurisdiction or control of the Administration.
